00499    inline int AtomStorage::nAtom() const
00500    { return atomSet_.size(); }

00503    { return ghostSet_.size(); }

00517    /*
00518    * On master processor (rank=0), stored value of total number of atoms.
00519    */
00520    inline int AtomStorage::nAtomTotal() const
00521    {
00522       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00523       if (nAtomTotal_ < 0) UTIL_THROW("Value not set: nAtomTotal < 0");
00524       return nAtomTotal_;
00525       #else
00526       return atomSet_.size();
00527       #endif
00528    }
00529 
00530    // Template method definition
00531 
00532    /*
00533    * Count the number of atoms in this Group and this AtomStorage.
00534    */
00535    template <int N>
00536    int AtomStorage::countGroupAtoms(Group<N>& group) const
00537    {
00538       Atom* ptr;
00539       int nAtom = 0;
00540       for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
00541          ptr = atomPtrs_[group.atomId(i)];
00542          if (ptr) {
00543             if (ptr->isGhost()) {
00544                UTIL_THROW("Found ghost atom");
00545             }
00546             ++nAtom;
00547          }
00548       }
00549       return nAtom;
00550    }
00551 
00552    /*
00553    * Set pointers to atoms in a Group<N> object.
00554    */
00555    template <int N>
00556    int AtomStorage::findGroupAtoms(Group<N>& group) const
00557    {
00558       Atom* ptr;
00559       int nAtom = 0;
00560       for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
00561          ptr = atomPtrs_[group.atomId(i)];
00562          if (ptr) {
00563             group.setAtomPtr(i, ptr);
00564             ++nAtom;
00565          } else {
00566             group.clearAtomPtr(i);
00567          }
00568       }
00569       return nAtom;
00570    }
